a63c4deb-b0fa-40f8-83f8-d55343219bca.description: FIT's Certificate Program, Intro to Browzwear's VSticher, equips fashion designers and technical designers with the skill to create garments with the leading 3D apparel design solution. Designs are displayed in a photorealistic 360° view combined with animation simulating wear in motion, to support fit optimization and patterns are automatically generated and easily exported as AAMA/ASTM .dxf format.
a63c4deb-b0fa-40f8-83f8-d55343219bca.name: Introduction to Browzwear's VStitcher

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: In this 6-week certificate program, students learn VStitcher with Browzwear 3D and the Open Platform. This software allows more creative designs, faster time to market with less waste, and all the benefits of a digital workflow.

6f047f3a-2745-4dcf-8a09-6fcd5649d2b2.description: FIT's User Experience (UX) Design Certificate Program is tailored for creative professionals who are looking to advance their career in the exciting field of UX Design. This program is a well-rounded education in UX Design that will foster career growth through lectures, discussions, critiques, and prototyping.
6f047f3a-2745-4dcf-8a09-6fcd5649d2b2.name: User Experience Design

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students complete an 8-week intensive program as well as a final project including research, competitor analysis, ideation, persona, empathy map, application map, task flow(s), prototyping, and usability testing. The course completes with a final presentation including a digital prototype.

8e725742-c388-48d7-8d9c-118467319819.description: This program is an introduction to CLO 3D Garment Visualization. Participants learn how to use CLO’s robust 3D simulation engine to create garment styles with countless layers and intricate details, instantly make modifications to 2D patterns, colors, textures and finishing details, and check silhouette and fit early in the development process. Students learn to quickly sketch new designs directly on an avatar and automatically generate pattern pieces.
8e725742-c388-48d7-8d9c-118467319819.name: Introduction to CLO's 3D Garment Visualization

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is earned by those who successfully complete FIT’s Introduction to CLO's 3D Garment Visualization Certificate Program. (30 hours of instruction).

d46c0a6a-1e95-4f1a-af18-82bd14c80248.description: Fashion Stylists bring their clients’ visions to life through clothing and accessories in photo shoots, runway shows, and more. During this course, aspiring stylists will learn the skills needed to enter this exciting industry through assisting. Students will learn the different genres of fashion styling and the skills needed for each through hands-on projects and real-world experiences in each module of the program.
d46c0a6a-1e95-4f1a-af18-82bd14c80248.name: Fashion Styling Fundamentals

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students complete an 8-week intensive program as well as projects including client presentation, still life shoot, on figure shoot, and how to pin clothing on a model while gaining knowledge about the details and steps needed to support a stylist on a shoot.

skills.name: Create A Mood Board Based On A Theme

5db9077a-898c-42bd-b78c-d6b7028fb685.description: FIT's User Interface (UI) Design Certificate Program provides hands-on experience to prepare for a career in UI Design. Through lectures, discussions, demonstrations, critiques, and workshops, students gain an in-depth understanding of the guidelines, practices, and methodologies of UI Design.
5db9077a-898c-42bd-b78c-d6b7028fb685.name: User Interface Design

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students complete an 8-week intensive program as well as a final project including research, ideation, prototyping, and usability testing. Course completes with a final presentation including a UI Design system and a click-through high fidelity prototype.

d552cffc-d826-419a-96b1-297fa3fea527.description: This “mini-MBA” program provided selected fashion designers with the business acumen, resources, and community to grow their companies. Designers accepted into the program were immersed in weekend learning intensives focused on marketing, financials, and operations. Each designer was paired with a mentor to help them complete a business plan. The program culminated with a pitch event at which designers competed for a cash prize to be used to execute their business plan.
d552cffc-d826-419a-96b1-297fa3fea527.name: FIT Design Entrepreneurs

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is earned by those who attend all program sessions  (36 hours of instruction and four months of mentoring) and submit a strong business plan putting to work all that they have learned about marketing, operations and financials.

1f003927-6164-4e51-818f-2aebd07d9d35.description: Image consulting professionals advise clients to optimize physical attributes, minimize challenge areas in order to project an authentic image for personal and professional success.
1f003927-6164-4e51-818f-2aebd07d9d35.name: Image Consulting

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Present a case study of a color and wardrobe plan according to a client’s goals, select fit and proportion to optimize client attributes, participate in interactive client assessment activities with practice clients, outline the steps of client services: color analysis, closet and wardrobe planning and the personal shopping session, write basic business materials, design and deliver marketing messages, practice professional level communications in both client critiquing and sales,

c147d72c-efb1-4f8d-8594-49e831381317.description: FIT's Motion Graphics Certificate Program teaches students how to create impressive 2D motion graphics using Adobe After Effects. Through hands-on exercises, students learn the fundamental animation techniques and skills while focusing on the principles and concepts behind effective storytelling. Students finish this program with a showreel.
c147d72c-efb1-4f8d-8594-49e831381317.name: Motion Graphics Level 1

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This hands-on introductory level 6-week course covers the fundamentals of Adobe After Effects. Students learn time-based design concepts, terminology, and interface of After Effects. Topics include compositions, layers, animation, keyframing, effects, rendering, and best practices for file management.

135065ce-1c0a-4154-85c6-cc0fdc1e34e2.description: In this program you will learn the fundamentals of costume design, wardrobe, hand stitching techniques, and job search tools. Upon completion, you’ll have the basic tools needed to successfully develop a practical and marketable skill set in the field of costuming that will allow you to define a character through clothing and accessories, a fundamental understanding of wardrobe, and introductory hand sewing skills.
135065ce-1c0a-4154-85c6-cc0fdc1e34e2.name: Costume Design and Wardrobe Technician

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Upon successful completion, students will create a costume design and wardrobe bible, complete a script analysis, create a design statement and character research boards, sketch and render designs using watercolor and pencil, create a costume plot and character closet, learn basic hand sewing techniques, and make both a cover letter and resume for the wardrobe and costume design industry.

b0f50f6d-a6f4-4a3d-a88d-2c705f5c814f.description: This certificate program was designed for professionals at all levels who want to learn how to use data to drive their design process, measure their work’s business impact, and target, test, and optimize content in real-time.
b0f50f6d-a6f4-4a3d-a88d-2c705f5c814f.name: Data-Driven Design for Digital Marketing and Social Media

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Over the course of 8 weeks, students work in interdisciplinary teams to develop a book building case study across a campaign lifecycle. Through this process, students learn to leverage social and digital analytics tools from defining measurable business goals to insight gathering and audience segmentation, to creative campaign development, to create A/B optimization tests. This class is taught by industry professionals and features a notable list of guest lecturers.

072ed8ec-4b59-4724-bb15-9a23032961fd.description: FIT's Sustainable Design Entrepreneur Certificate Program is tailored for design professionals who are looking to advance their knowledge of sustainability and sustainable design thinking. This program is a well-rounded education that includes courses in sustainable manufacturing, social responsibility, sustainable materials, working with artisans and more.
072ed8ec-4b59-4724-bb15-9a23032961fd.name: Sustainable Design Entrepreneurs

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 7 courses for a total of 84 hours.

3074cd6b-7d3f-40e7-a78b-14b00a4ad2b8.description: This certificate course covers CLO’s advanced virtual garment visualization tools and skills for fashion design development and presentation. You will learn essential skills you need to become an expert 3D designer using CLO. How to create and express more various and intricate garments will be learned throughout this course. The course will train you to intuitively translate any CAD drawing or physical garments to become 3D virtual garments and instantly transform existing 2D garment patterns i
3074cd6b-7d3f-40e7-a78b-14b00a4ad2b8.name: Advanced CLO's 3D Garment Visualization Certificate Program

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certificate course covers CLO’s advanced virtual garment visualization tools and skills for fashion design development and presentation. You will learn essential skills you need to become an expert 3D designer using CLO. How to create and express more various and intricate garments will be learned throughout this course. The course will train you to intuitively translate any CAD drawing or physical garments to become 3D virtual garments and instantly transform existing 2D garment patterns i

cd40d6ad-c6f8-43a1-8ed3-cd29e2b25df8.description: Artists, designers, and merchandisers embark on an 8-week certificate program that cultivates their ability to use color to achieve success and increase sales with an understanding of consumer behavior. Work hands-on developing professional palettes to make confident design, styling and merchandising decisions. This course includes a panel discussion by industry experts who work with color in their fields, career coaching, and a special session conducted by a top trend expert.
cd40d6ad-c6f8-43a1-8ed3-cd29e2b25df8.name: Color Specialist for Art, Design and Fashion-Related Products

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: SXC 110 requires attendance and willingness to try. Students are given assignments for trend and mood boards, color wheel painting, note taking. Course and instructors support and meet each student where they are. Students are taught and influenced by 6 seasoned professionals. Course includes lectures and visits from people working with color in their lives. Course also has a life coach inspiring students to gain clarity in their skill set and goals.

81b2904b-6366-4e4c-9430-21fe9614510d.description: FIT’s Front-End Website Development Certificate Program introduces the fundamental skills and knowledge for designing and building interactions on the internet. Students develop essential knowledge required to create an accessible front-end for web pages and websites. Learn how to build responsive websites as well as best practices for web page design using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, and jQuery as well as industry-standard tools such as GitHub and Sublime Text.
81b2904b-6366-4e4c-9430-21fe9614510d.name: Front-End Website Development

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This 6-week certificate program is for anyone who wants to expand their creativity into the exciting field of website design. Prior coding experience is not required. Students get hands-on experience with front-end web development languages: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery.

skills.name: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, CMS, Web Design, Website Creation

ec0258bc-16c7-44bf-a415-0208febf985a.description: FIT's Fashion Business Essentials remote learning program brings the New York City fashion industry to you. Skilled instructors will share their extensive experience and know-how. Each session will provide relevant takeaways and an opportunity for you to bring into the discussion your individual needs and concerns. This program is designed for those just starting a fashion business, those in business for a few years, and anyone with an interest in better understanding the fashion industry.
ec0258bc-16c7-44bf-a415-0208febf985a.name: Fashion Business Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students complete a six-week intensive program in-which they will learn the business of their fashion business. Students will be required to attend all classes and complete any class work that is assigned.

43c4f083-2fb8-42e1-8267-dae5226872a7.description: This Certificate will prepare fashion professionals and those seeking a career in Product Development for today’s fashion industry. Fashion development today relies on new technologies as well as advanced methods of process control and resource management to optimize development resources reducing the product development time cycle to meet the demand of modern retailers. This certificate includes concentrations on the latest topics.
43c4f083-2fb8-42e1-8267-dae5226872a7.name: Product Development Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Learning modules in Blackboard presenting the following content: lessons in written form with support video and slide content, learning exercises to support learning via activities that utilize the module content, self-test quizzes in multiple choice format, online discussion boards supporting the module content with challenging topics, and support sessions.

9afe0bbb-e0f9-4fd3-a9d4-d588009fbb77.description: An accelerated course that provides lectures, discussions, case studies, event development workshops, and projects. Students will learn how to develop dynamic events as an individual or for a company. Learn how to plan both hybrid and face to face events during this challenging time. In this program, students will gain the latest insights, knowledge, and industry skills you can apply to planning diverse and sustainable events.
9afe0bbb-e0f9-4fd3-a9d4-d588009fbb77.name: Fashion Events

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This program is ideal for entrepreneurs who want to strengthen or launch their own event planning business, professionals interested in branded and targeted events, and individuals who want to increase their fundamental knowledge of the fashion event planning process. This program will essentially provide you with the tools and credentials necessary to become an independent event planner, work for a brand, agency or production company.

7e0c793b-127f-4f06-8714-0eb78c5b8c9a.description: How to elevate brands to make them meaningful beyond the material, peerless, priceless and profitable.
7e0c793b-127f-4f06-8714-0eb78c5b8c9a.name: Luxury and Lifestyle Brand Strategy Master Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and actively participate, complete a team project applying the class learning, complete a quiz on the course content

88b9eb8b-cfa8-4456-8494-428dbc7e8dcc.description: FIT's 3D Printing for Designers is designed for creatives from all industries looking to incorporate the technology into their work. This program will introduce students to a variety of digital fabrication techniques and software.
88b9eb8b-cfa8-4456-8494-428dbc7e8dcc.name: Introduction to 3D Printing for Designers

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students complete a 6-week training program and learn the basics of CAD modeling as well as identify which of the digital fabrication techniques best suits the needs of different types of designs.

656965b3-94bc-4e88-8fef-78d32ab8c015.description: This course covers analytics techniques applied to retail and fashion-related industries. Both analytic and business side of all calculations and techniques will be discussed. How these techniques are used and why they make sense for a business are woven together throughout the course. Students will learn how to analyze demand and retail data and how components such as seasonality, trend, and weather affect the data. Statistical data will be used to predict forecasts and measure their accuracy.
656965b3-94bc-4e88-8fef-78d32ab8c015.name: Predictive Analytics

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students will work directly with visiting industry experts from Planalytics.  You will develop the ability to analyze inventory management decisions using the tools of statistics and probability and gain facility in decision making under uncertainty.  This course will involve hands-on use of common spreadsheet tools with many specific applications involving the fashion industry. Emphasis will be on common analytical techniques that can be leveraged for any business situation.

4d26efdf-150e-49e7-823c-86315c9815cd.description: An in-depth certificate course that will prepare students with an intimates and swimwear background of learnings. Students will continue with how to’s, encompassing each student’s unique design, and fulfilling everything from the product development, production, and shipping the garments to the retail markets.
4d26efdf-150e-49e7-823c-86315c9815cd.name: Intimate Apparel & Swimwear Certificate

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: To be able to interface and hand off Product Development to a sample room and factory.

3cab39e4-a18e-42d2-997a-23576c91b2cf.description: This certificate is designed to help industry professionals such as patternmakers and technical designers learn Gerber AccuMark PDS, a computerized pattern design program. The basics of system management, digitizing, plotting, and pattern development are introduced using Gerber AccuMark PDS. This is great for professionals such as patternmakers, technical designers, and 3D designers who are looking to learn computerized patternmaking using the industry’s premiere pattern design program.
3cab39e4-a18e-42d2-997a-23576c91b2cf.name: Computerized Patternmaking—Gerber AccuMark PDS

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This course will give you the skills to use the program and applications to other design CAD and production management programs.

9196bb43-145f-430b-ab4c-4d4f7683793e.description: Aspiring Fashion Stylists will learn advanced styling techniques to enhance their skill sets during this certificate course. Learn about the other genres of fashion that stylists can use to bring their clients visions to life. Students will experience the artistry of mens fashion styling and prop and set design. Important hands-on sewing skills, portfolio building, and resume writing will all also be taught. Real world experiences and projects will accompany each module.
9196bb43-145f-430b-ab4c-4d4f7683793e.name: Fashion Styling: Advanced

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students will complete an 8-week interactive program with photoshoots. They will complete a portfolio to present to clients.

666639b4-3128-480f-8fff-9582d3e6bc3a.description: This certificate course provides a deep dive into how branding is serving the purposeful economy and what else can be done to move the needle in today's marketplace. It does so by introducing neurologically based archetypes the "caregiver" and the "creator" and how successful sustainable brands have captured and communicated the sustainability values implicit in these archetypes. Goals include pivoting to circularity, implementing social fairness and ensuring self-sustaining environments.
666639b4-3128-480f-8fff-9582d3e6bc3a.name: Brand Strategies for a Sustainable and Purpose Economy

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Each Student must write a final paper that takes a challenge in the sustainability space, describes its degree of difficulty, and offers a series of resolutions as scenarios.

f25300ff-1c1c-4b91-847d-91a48fb5a71b.description: FIT's UX/UI Master Certificate is a 10-week program geared to portfolio preparation and launching a new career. It is designed to give students the best chance of employment as a user experience or user interface designer. A team of top experts in the field of UX and UI provide practical knowledge, portfolio refinement advice, and design challenge assignments.
f25300ff-1c1c-4b91-847d-91a48fb5a71b.name: UX/UI Design Master Certification

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This capstone portfolio program requires a pre-registration review and only 8 students are selected to enroll for each term.

skills.name: User Experience, UX, UI, Design Thinking

928f52c0-8836-4195-8904-04dae16d8e50.description: FIT’s Design for Social Impact certificate program introduces the process of Socratic inquiry, systems-based design thinking, and solutions-based design making. Through lectures, discussions, exercises, and creative challenges, this program enables designers to recognize and embrace the power they hold to create designs that empower those who are underserved, voiceless, and marginalized in society.
928f52c0-8836-4195-8904-04dae16d8e50.name: Design for Social Impact

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 5 assignments in 8 weeks.

c34aaa37-2ce9-4aad-9c0e-169626cac7bb.description: FIT’s AR/VR Content Design Certificate program is an 8-week training course designed for creative professionals who have little or no previous experience in AR/VR but are interested in how to bring their ideas onto these new platforms.
c34aaa37-2ce9-4aad-9c0e-169626cac7bb.name: AR/VR Content Design

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This hands-on introductory-level program covers the technology and design fundamentals for Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality content design.

d383036c-1e7f-4cb5-9b36-c12a448ef5b2.description: The benchmark concept is a powerful analytic as it is category agnostic and draws from every business vertical and funnels the insights into the fashion space. Based on an understanding of how consumers process symbolic information, proceed to choices in the form of purchases, loyalty and advocating of your brand, and its products, this course draws upon iconic brands and extracts their enduring principles as benchmarks or standards of success.
d383036c-1e7f-4cb5-9b36-c12a448ef5b2.name: Brand Management: Creating & Managing A Benchmark Fashion Brand

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Each student creates and writes an operational Brand Marketing Plan for either a launch, a re-positioning or a revitalization of a brand. The subject matter is sector agnostic as the skills learned apply to any business, in any vertical, at any time.

c3f9c783-533b-4ada-b8e6-4338d9c219ed.description: The benchmark concept is a powerful analytic as it is category agnostic and draws from every business vertical and funnels the insights into the fashion space. Based on an understanding of how consumers process symbolic information, proceed to choices in the form of purchases, loyalty and advocating of your brand, and its products, this course draws upon iconic brands and extracts their enduring principles as benchmarks or standards of success.
c3f9c783-533b-4ada-b8e6-4338d9c219ed.name: Branding Essentials for Career and Business Success

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Each student creates and writes an operational Brand Marketing Plan for either a launch, a re-positioning or a revitalization of a brand. The subject matter is sector agnostic as the skills learned apply to any business, in any vertical, at any time.

fdeb8c74-d994-42ca-818b-5470f83a9893.description: This 8-week program will support business owners and CSR/ESG executives as well as entrepreneurs who see the practice of reporting sustainability efforts as a pathway for increasing commitments and initiatives. While fashion is particularly implicated in sustainability issues, it is an issue all companies are expected to address. This program is designed to assist Garment District businesses to set goals, drive progress, and report results in their move to greater sustainability.
fdeb8c74-d994-42ca-818b-5470f83a9893.name: Reporting for Sustainability

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students will complete this 8-week intensive program in sustainable reporting. Students will be required to attend all class sessions and complete any in class assignments.

a1fec269-35fa-425b-a7a4-2e789db5aaaa.description: The Ross / FIT product technical training is a program designed with select FIT courses that provide training on the technical skills needed in a Product Technical services role. The course helps students to build the technical knowledge and expertise to evaluate products, identify issues, and determine and communicate corrections to third parties.
a1fec269-35fa-425b-a7a4-2e789db5aaaa.name: Ross / FIT Product Technical Training

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all courses with an overall program passing grade as determined by Professors based on class participation, quizzes, homework assignments, and/or projects.

f8f917af-51a3-4664-a69e-e02cbc60b21e.description: This certificate course provides a deep dive into how branding is serving the purposeful economy and what else can be done to move the needle in today's marketplace. It does so by introducing neurologically based archetypes the "caregiver" and the "creator" and how successful sustainable brands have captured and communicated the sustainability values implicit in these archetypes. Goals include pivoting to circularity, implementing social fairness and ensuring self-sustaining environments.
f8f917af-51a3-4664-a69e-e02cbc60b21e.name: Brand Strategies for Sustainability and the Circular Economy

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Each Student must write a final paper that takes a challenge in the sustainability space, describes its degree of difficulty, and offers a series of resolutions as scenarios.

ad040f74-e79c-41a9-90ec-80bc7f103617.description: This certification is an intensive three-day seminar that will assist graduate students with the technical tools and software skills to be successful when they enter into the first semester as well as the third semester of the Graduate Exhibition and Experience Design Program at FIT in the fall. This seminar will provide students an overview of industry specific drafting standards, techniques, and documentation formats as well as an overview of industry standard rendering software programs.
ad040f74-e79c-41a9-90ec-80bc7f103617.name: MA Exhibition and Experience Design Technical Skills Certification

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students complete 18 hours of intensive technical skills training in Exhibition & Experience Design industry standard software applications. Students learn through demos, exercises, and in-class studio work.

8efd8e74-aebc-4d7a-9c04-c153b7ebb024.description: This certificate is for those pursuing a career in the new world of retailing. It covers the multiple channels to serve the customer from the many forms of e-commerce to bricks and mortar. The course provides a framework for analysis of business models of emerging and successful practitioners. It includes the new role of merchandising, omni-channel financial measures, customer behavior analysis, success factors, the role of social media, and the growing use of new technologies.
8efd8e74-aebc-4d7a-9c04-c153b7ebb024.name: Omni-Channel Management

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: A group research project provides the opportunity to experience how to take a business, your company, and your career to the next level. Learn from highly experienced industry professionals through lecture, panels, discussion, and off-site market tours.

dd04b450-69d0-4936-a4b3-a4e54ede0cbe.description: Students will learn how to brand yourself as an individual or company. Develop your own brand identity and plan top strategies from physical products to you as an individual. In this program you will gain new insights, knowledge and skills you can apply to your brand. You will explore and understand the fundamentals of branding and marketing—the importance of brand identity, crafting your brand story, brand development for maximum growth, brand communication, and go-to-market strategy.
dd04b450-69d0-4936-a4b3-a4e54ede0cbe.name: Personal Branding and Marketing

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Students complete an 8-week program as well as a final presentation including brand executive summary, crafting a brand story, building a brand style guide, brand marketing and communication strategy, influencer campaign and strategic brand partnerships. The course completes with a final presentation including an initial branding and marketing plan.

f56d0712-691b-429c-afa8-780baf6ae922.description: FIT's UX/UI Master Certificate is a 10-week program geared to portfolio preparation and launching a new career. It is designed to give students the best chance of employment as a user experience or user interface designer. A team of top experts in the field of UX and UI provide practical knowledge, portfolio refinement advice, and design challenge assignments. The course also include job searching and interview tips. This capstone portfolio program requires a pre-registration review.
f56d0712-691b-429c-afa8-780baf6ae922.name: Experience Design Master Certification Certified Faculty

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certification badge is awarded after teaching FIT's UX/UI Master Certification program successfully multiple terms. Qualitative review of professional achievements, program learning outcomes, and student evaluations were completed for the certification.

skills.name: User Experience, UX, UI, Design Thinking

cee2cc8c-db38-4fc5-9039-4bf67e06dc22.description: FIT’s Unity XR Certificate program is a 12-week training course designed for creative professionals who have little or no previous experience in XR but are interested in how to bring their ideas onto these new platforms. This program is a comprehensive introduction to developing XR applications using Unity and the C# programming language.
cee2cc8c-db38-4fc5-9039-4bf67e06dc22.name: Unity XR: AR, MR, VR Development

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certification badge is awarded after completing FIT's Unity XR Certificate program.

9d8f4fa7-0de7-4bf8-b066-e9ee2a880c73.description: FIT's User Experience Design Certificate Program is tailored for creative professionals who are looking to advance their career in the exciting field of user experience design. Faculty members of this certificate program are industry professionals that are active practitioners and leaders in this field.
9d8f4fa7-0de7-4bf8-b066-e9ee2a880c73.name: User Experience (UX) Design Certified Faculty

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: This certification badge is awarded after teaching FIT's UX Design certificate program successfully multiple terms. Qualitative review of professional achievements, program learning outcomes, and student evaluations were completed for the certification.

fc65983c-bbf8-45fe-8cb7-dcc77ca6afae.description: FIT's User Interface (UI) Design Certificate Program provides hands-on experience to prepare for a career in user interface design. Through lectures, discussions, demonstrations, critics, and workshops, students gain an in depth understanding of the guidelines, practices, and methodologies of user interface design.

d01fc8d4-23a8-4a12-935c-d58208de3ef5.description: This certificate program was designed for professionals at all levels who want to learn how to use data to drive their design process, measure their work’s business impact, and target, test, and optimize content in real-time.

8d50a31d-7e0a-4d14-ad63-facbb6b85174.description: FIT’s Design for Social Impact certificate program introduces the process of Socratic inquiry, systems-based design thinking, and solutions-based design making. Through lectures, discussions, exercises, and creative challenges, this program enables designers to recognize and embrace the power they hold to create designs that empower those who are underserved, voiceless, and marginalized in society.
8d50a31d-7e0a-4d14-ad63-facbb6b85174.name: Design for Social Impact Certified Faculty

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

01ce74e3-046e-4ec0-aa70-d39f7325a9dd.description: FIT’s Front-end Website Development Certificate Program introduces the fundamental skills and knowledge for designing and building interactions on the internet. Students develop essential knowledge required to create an accessible front-end for web pages and websites. Learn how to build responsive websites as well as best practices for web page design using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, and jQuery as well as industry-standard tools such as GitHub and Sublime Text.
01ce74e3-046e-4ec0-aa70-d39f7325a9dd.name: Front-end Website Development Faculty

issuer.summary: issued by Fashion Institute of Technology

b798a5f7-dfdb-4a0e-8795-aef19d9e110b.description: FIT's Motion Graphics certificate program is tailored for creative professionals such as graphic designers who are looking to advance their career in the exciting field of motion graphics. f28fd7b5-7330-4f47-be19-56373acfe3bf.description: This certificate program helps art directors, writers, and aspiring new creatives prepare and improve their portfolio for this dynamic and changing world of advertising.
